sentences.en: A wide range to meet the most demanding specifications coupled with unstinting quality sets us apart.
sentences.cn: 符合高标准高质量,丰富的产品系列使我们与众不同.

sentences.en: He is unstinting in his encouragement.
sentences.cn: 他不吝惜于给与人鼓励.

sentences.en: I can't speak too highly of the unstinting help I received.
sentences.cn: 我对我得到的慷慨帮助无论怎样称赞都不会过分.

sentences.en: She was unstinting in her efforts to help.
sentences.cn: 她不遗馀力地提供援助.

sentences.en: The task of producing the text was made easier by the unstinting help and generosity extended to me.
sentences.cn: 在人们的慷慨帮助下，我写这篇文章的工作变得轻松了许多。

sentences.en: They were unstinting in their praise.
We all appreciate your unstinting help.
sentences.cn: 我们都感谢你不吝相助.

words.tran_cn: 慷慨的；大方的；无限制的

trans.tran_en: unstinting support, help, praise etc is complete and given willingly
